Welcome to Open Health Tools – Your Path to Physical Wellness in New York

Empowering Your Movement, Enhancing Your Life

At Open Health Tools, located in the heart of New York, we are dedicated to guiding you through your journey of physical rehabilitation and wellness. Our team of skilled physical therapists combines years of expertise with a passion for delivering personalized care, ensuring that each step you take towards recovery is grounded in trust, professionalism, and excellence.

Our Services – Tailored to Your Unique Needs

We are a full physical therapy clinic offering all of the services you might get from a physical therapist. Here is a brief overview of the services we offer. For more details on our services, check out our dedicated services page:

  • Personalized Physical Therapy: Our approach to physical therapy is as unique as you are. We specialize in creating customized treatment plans that address your specific needs, whether you’re recovering from an injury, managing a chronic condition, or seeking to improve your overall physical health.
  • Sports Injury Rehabilitation: We understand the urgency and dedication of athletes. Our therapists are equipped to expedite your recovery, ensuring you return to your sport with enhanced performance and reduced risk of future injury.
  • Post-Surgical Rehabilitation: Post-operative care is crucial for a successful recovery. Our programs are designed to restore strength, mobility, and function, while also focusing on pain management and swelling reduction.
  • Chronic Pain Management: Chronic pain can be debilitating, but our holistic approach aims to reduce your discomfort and improve your quality of life through a combination of therapy techniques and education.
  • Geriatric Physical Therapy: We offer specialized care for older adults, focusing on improving mobility, balance, and strength to enhance independence and reduce the risk of falls.
  • Pediatric Physical Therapy: Our pediatric services are tailored to help children reach their developmental milestones, whether they’re recovering from an injury or dealing with a physical condition.
  • Workplace Ergonomics and Injury Prevention: We also provide guidance on workplace ergonomics to prevent injuries and promote a healthier, more productive work environment.

The Open Health Tools Blog – Insights and Inspiration by Johan Theorin

One of our unique offerings is the Open Health Tools Blog, curated and regularly updated by our very own Johan Theorin, a seasoned physical therapist and thought leader in the field. The blog serves as a hub of information, inspiration, and guidance for anyone interested in physical health and therapy.

What You’ll Find on Our Blog:

Latest Research and Trends: Stay informed about the latest developments in physical therapy, including innovative treatment techniques and cutting-edge research findings.

Health and Wellness Tips: Discover practical tips and advice for maintaining and improving your physical health, whether you’re in therapy or just looking to lead a healthier lifestyle.

Patient Stories: Be inspired by real-life stories of resilience and recovery from our patients, showcasing the transformative power of physical therapy.

Expert Insights: Gain valuable insights from Johan Theorin and other experts in the field, as they share their knowledge and experiences on various aspects of physical therapy and wellness.

Community Events: Stay connected with local events and workshops hosted by Open Health Tools, fostering a community of health and wellness enthusiasts.

Ready to Start Your Journey with Us?

At Open Health Tools, we are committed to helping you achieve your physical health goals in a supportive and empowering environment. Contact us today to schedule your first appointment and take the first step towards a healthier, more active life.

Address: 246 E 116th St, New York, NY 10029
Phone: (845) 459-3053
Email: appointments@openhealthtools.com
